text: Li Yuan-tsu (; September 24, 1923 - March 8, 2017) was a Chinese politician. He served under Lee Teng-hui as the eighth Vice President of the Republic of China. Li is of Hakka ancestry. He was born in Pingjiang, Hunan. Li died of kidney failure on March 8, 2017 in Toufen, Taiwan, aged 93. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Politicians from Hunan Category:Vice presidents of the Republic of China on Taiwan
title: Li Yuan-tsu
